cast.name: 克拉克·彼得斯 Clarke Peters

this_title: The Man Who Brought The Blues To Britain: Big Bill Broonzy
trans_title: 把蓝调带到英国的人：“大个子”比尔.布伦齐
introduction: Big Bill Broonzy would inspire a generation of musicians, yet he was not the man they believed him to be. This first, very intimate, biography of the pioneering bluesman uncovers the mystery of who Broonzy really was and follows his remarkable and colourful journey from the racist Deep South to the clubs of Chicago and all across the world.
chinese_title: 把蓝调带到英国的人：“大个子”比尔.布伦齐
foreign_title: The Man Who Brought The Blues To Britain: Big Bill Broonzy
